Gacchant，（a）﹐【現分】正在去。單.主.gacchaṁ﹑gacchanto﹑gacchato；復.主gacchanto﹑gacchantā；單.呼.gaccha﹑gacchanta﹑gacchaṁ；復.呼gacchanto﹑gacchantā；單.賓.gacchantaṁ﹑gacchataṁ；復.賓.gacchanto﹑gacchante；單.具.gacchatā﹑gacchantena；復.具.gacchantebhi﹑gacchantehi；單.離.gacchatā﹑gacchanta﹑gacchantamhā﹑gacchantasmā﹑gacchantato；復.離.gacchantebhi﹑gacchantehi；單.與.﹑屬.gacchāto﹑gacchantassa；復.與.﹑屬.gacchataṁ﹑gacchantānaṁ；單.處gacchanti﹑gacchante﹑gacchantamhi﹑gacchantasmiṁ；復.處.gacchantesu。
